author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
We've all seen the pics, we've watched the reels and we've tentatively clicked on the Kickstarter campaign. Well, now it's time to get hands on with the Vectrex Mini ~ Kickstarter: https://ishortn.ink/vectrex
